recipesJson.name: Farley's Gnarly Sauce Remix (POD / MTL)
recipesJson.author: Hexical
recipesJson.description:
#####**Description & Setup**
Bad Drip's Lab describes Gnarley Sauce as a "masterpiece of sweet and fruity blend, presenting a balance of sweet and tangy kiwi strawberries mixed with a special bubblegum nectar for an otherworldly mix.". It was one of my favourite commercial juices before I went to DIY. At first I wanted to accomplish a 1:1 copy, but after a few people have said it tastes quite better. I decided to go ahead and run with that and make it even better. This is the Pod / MTL Version, refer to the OG linked at the bottom for DL. 

Tested on a Cthulu 1928 MTL RDA, 15w 6 wraps 2mm 25mg/mL Nicotine

#####**Notes**

Refer to the OG for the notes :)

Hope you enjoy this remix! Let me know your thoughts if you mix it up :)

reviews.text: Great recipe me and my girl both used to love this in our pods, been long enough now time to remix
